projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects, experience, and writing with a performant, responsive UI.

projects.title: Big Data Architecture
projects.description: Educational site illustrating Hadoop, Hive, and Spark architectures with clear data flows, components, and practical examples.

projects.title: Brain Tumor Classifier
projects.description: Brain tumor classifier by fine‑tuning EfficientNet‑V2‑S in PyTorch, delivered with a Streamlit front end for interactive inference.

projects.title: Data Engineering: ETL Pipeline
projects.description: Production‑ready ETL on Databricks (Apache Spark, Delta Lake) to ingest, transform, and model data from data lake sources.

projects.title: Terakoya Academia Inc [ Now TAI Inc]
projects.description: Internal web platform for Terakoya Academia Inc.; initially built in Django and later migrated to PHP to align with hosting and team workflows.

projects.title: ETL Pipeline
projects.description: Containerized ETL service in Rust that ingests, validates, and loads data into PostgreSQL with a focus on reliability and horizontal scaling.

projects.title: Leetcode + HackerRank Solutions
projects.description: Curated solutions to 50+ SQL challenges (LeetCode/HackerRank), highlighting query patterns and best practices for data work.
